mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(mem_num,id,pwd,name,phone,email,addr,regdate,point) VALUES( ( SELECT MAX(mem_num) FROM users_tb ), #{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{addr},SYSDATE,1000)
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM users WHERE name=#{name} AND email=#{email}
SELECT pwd FROM users WHERE id=#{id} AND phone=#{phone}
SELECT id FROM users WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT a.id,a.pwd,a.mem_num,b.mem_flag FROM users a,users_tb b WHERE a.id=#{id} AND a.pwd=#{pwd} AND a.mem_num=b.mem_num
